snippet.title: COCOON | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
COCOON will be coming to Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and Steam in 2023. Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1497440?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=061222&utm_medium=directreach 

From Jeppe Carlsen, the lead gameplay designer of LIMBO and INSIDE — COCOON takes you on an adventure across worlds within worlds. Master world-leaping mechanics to unravel a cosmic mystery. https://www.cocoongame.com/

Developed by GEOMETRIC INTERACTIVE. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2022
